1212630.name: Soundtracks From Larth
1212630.description:
The Soundtracks from Larth brings all the music used in the Shadows of Larth.

Each Track is an MP3 file well labeled for you to check after you played the game or before.

Track List :



1- Yaldur Val Eir - 3:15
2- Her Majesty - 5:20
3- Usurper - 4:48
4- The First Crafter - 3:32
5- Cripple No More - 2:52
6- Anzar - 5:25
7- The Wind Gate - 2:34
8- Lord of the Woods - 4:35
9- My Lord Crow - 4:35
10- Red Wings in the Skies - 4:29
11- The Two Heirs - 2:17
12- A Shadow of Larth - 1:50
13- The Flower of Vargeth - 1:10
14- End Credits 1:09
1212630.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
